attributes.action: All People Able Bodied on Benifits should do community work 2 days a week.
attributes.additional_details: Anyone recieving benifits that are able bodied should have to do 2 days community work a week, a full 8hr day, Any day absent then they have a days benifit docked pro rata. This will keep them in an environment that makes them get up early and have a work ethic maintained. This work can be anything from sweeping the streets,cutting grass verges,painting,return shopping trolleys to stores,picking up litter,removing graphiti, helping in care homes or hospise,doing general maintenance for eldery.running errands.
